00045         dst = src;                                                                              \
00046 } while (0)

00106 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvHdrCellEvent : public wxNotifyEvent
00107 {
00108 public:
00109         wxAdvHdrCellEvent()
00110         : wxNotifyEvent()
00111         {
00112                 m_hdrCell = NULL;
00113                 m_x = -1;
00114                 m_y = -1;
00115                 m_control = false;
00116                 m_shift = false;
00117                 m_alt = false;
00118                 m_meta = false;
00119         }
00120 
00121         wxAdvHdrCellEvent(int id, wxEventType type, wxObject* obj,
00122                         wxAdvHdrCell *hdrCell, int x = -1, int y = -1,
00123                         bool control = false, bool shift = false, bool alt = false, bool meta = false);
00124 
00125 
00126         wxAdvHdrCell *GetHdrCell() { return m_hdrCell; }
00127         wxPoint     GetPosition() { return wxPoint( m_x, m_y ); }
00128         bool        ControlDown() { return m_control; }
00129         bool        MetaDown() { return m_meta; }
00130         bool        ShiftDown() { return m_shift; }
00131         bool        AltDown() { return m_alt; }
00132         bool        CmdDown()
00133         {
00134 #if defined(__WXMAC__) || defined(__WXCOCOA__)
00135                 return MetaDown();
00136 #else
00137                 return ControlDown();
00138 #endif
00139         }
00140 
00141         virtual wxEvent *Clone() const { return new wxAdvHdrCellEvent(*this); }
00142 
00143 protected:
00144         wxAdvHdrCell *m_hdrCell;
00145         int         m_x;
00146         int         m_y;
00147         bool        m_control;
00148         bool        m_meta;
00149         bool        m_shift;
00150         bool        m_alt;
00151 
00152         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS_NO_ASSIGN(wxAdvHdrCellEvent)
00153 };

00155 typedef void (wxEvtHandler::*wxAdvHdrCellEventFunction)(wxAdvHdrCellEvent &);

00161     wx__DECLARE_EVT1(wxEVT_ADVTABLE_ ## evt, id, wxAdvHdrCellEventHandler(fn))

00164 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK, id, fn)

00180 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvCoord
00181 {
00182 public:
00183         wxAdvCoord()
00184         {
00185                 Unset();
00186         }
00187 
00188         virtual ~wxAdvCoord()
00189         {
00190         }
00191 
00195         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00196         {
00197                 m_row = row;
00198                 m_col = col;
00199         }
00200 
00201         void operator = (const wxAdvCoord &o)
00202         {
00203                 m_row = o.m_row;
00204                 m_col = o.m_col;
00205         }
00206 
00207         bool IsSet()
00208         {
00209                 return (m_row != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col != UNDEF_SIZE);
00210         }
00211 
00212         void Unset()
00213         {
00214                 m_row = UNDEF_SIZE;
00215                 m_col = UNDEF_SIZE;
00216         }
00217 
00218         bool Equal(size_t row, size_t col)
00219         {
00220                 return (m_row == row) && (m_col == col);
00221         }
00222 
00227         size_t Row()
00228         {
00229                 return m_row;
00230         }
00231 
00236         size_t Col()
00237         {
00238                 return m_col;
00239         }
00240 
00241 private:
00242         size_t m_row, m_col;
00243 };

00248 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvRange
00249 {
00250 public:
00251         wxAdvRange()
00252         {
00253                 Unset();
00254         }
00255 
00256         wxAdvRange(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00257         {
00258                 Set(row1, col1, row2, col2);
00259         }
00260 
00261         virtual ~wxAdvRange()
00262         {
00263         }
00264 
00270         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00271         {
00272                 m_row1 = row;
00273                 m_col1 = col;
00274                 m_row2 = row;
00275                 m_col2 = col;
00276         }
00277 
00278         void Set(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00279         {
00280                 m_row1 = row1;
00281                 m_col1 = col1;
00282                 m_row2 = row2;
00283                 m_col2 = col2;
00284         }
00285 
00286         void Unset()
00287         {
00288                 Set(UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE);
00289         }
00290 
00295         bool IsSet()
00296         {
00297                 return (m_row1 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col1 != UNDEF_SIZE) &&
00298                                 (m_row2 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col2 != UNDEF_SIZE);
00299         }
00300 
00307         bool Contains(size_t row, size_t col)
00308         {
00309                 return (row >= TopRow() && row <= BottomRow()) &&
00310                                 (col >= LeftCol() && col <= RightCol());
00311         }
00312 
00316         bool IsSingleCell()
00317         {
00318                 return ((TopRow() == BottomRow()) &&
00319                                 (LeftCol() == RightCol()));
00320         }
00321 
00330         bool Equals(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00331         {
00332                 return (m_row1 == row1) && (m_col1 == col1)
00333                                 && (m_row2 == row2) && (m_col2 == col2);
00334         }
00335 
00336         void operator = (const wxAdvRange &o)
00337         {
00338                 m_row1 = o.m_row1;
00339                 m_col1 = o.m_col1;
00340                 m_row2 = o.m_row2;
00341                 m_col2 = o.m_col2;
00342         }
00343 
00344         size_t Row1()
00345         {
00346                 return m_row1;
00347         }
00348 
00349         size_t Row2()
00350         {
00351                 return m_row2;
00352         }
00353 
00354         size_t Col1()
00355         {
00356                 return m_col1;
00357         }
00358 
00359         size_t Col2()
00360         {
00361                 return m_col2;
00362         }
00363 
00364         size_t TopRow()
00365         {
00366                 return min(m_row1, m_row2);
00367         }
00368 
00369         size_t BottomRow()
00370         {
00371                 return max(m_row1, m_row2);
00372         }
00373 
00374         size_t LeftCol()
00375         {
00376                 return min(m_col1, m_col2);
00377         }
00378 
00379         size_t RightCol()
00380         {
00381                 return max(m_col1, m_col2);
00382         }
00383 
00384 private:
00385         size_t min(size_t a, size_t b)
00386         {
00387                 size_t m = wxMin(a, b);
00388                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00389                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00390                                 m = a;
00391                         }
00392                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00393                                 m = b;
00394                         }
00395                 }
00396                 return m;
00397         }
00398 
00399         size_t max(size_t a, size_t b)
00400         {
00401                 size_t m = wxMax(a, b);
00402                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00403                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00404                                 m = a;
00405                         }
00406                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00407                                 m = b;
00408                         }
00409                 }
00410                 return m;
00411         }
00412 
00413         size_t m_row1, m_col1;
00414         size_t m_row2, m_col2;
00415 };
00416

00511 
00519         virtual bool SetCellValue(size_t row, size_t col, wxString value) = 0;
00520

00528 
00535         virtual bool IsCellEditable(size_t row, size_t col) = 0;
00536

00555 
00556 protected:

00558         FIRE_VOID(TableChanged);
00559 };

00958 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvTableSorter
00959 {
00960 public:
00961         wxAdvTableSorter();
00962         virtual ~wxAdvTableSorter();
00963 
00964         virtual int Compare(wxAdvTable *table, size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2) = 0;
00965 };
00966 
00970 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvTableStringSorter : public wxAdvTableSorter
00971 {
00972 public:
00973         wxAdvTableStringSorter();
00974         virtual ~wxAdvTableStringSorter();
00975 
00976         virtual int Compare(wxAdvTable *table, size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2);
00977 
00978 private:
00979         int Compare(wxString value1, wxString value2);
00980 };
00981 
00985 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvTableDoubleSorter : public wxAdvTableSorter
00986 {
00987 public:
00988         wxAdvTableDoubleSorter();
00989         virtual ~wxAdvTableDoubleSorter();
00990 
00991         virtual int Compare(wxAdvTable *table, size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2);
00992 
00993 private:
00994         int Compare(double value1, double value2);
00995 };

00997 
01011 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvHdrCell
01012 {
01013         friend class wxAdvTable;
01014         friend class wxAdvDefaultHdrCellRenderer;
01015 public:
01016         static const int defaultSpacing = 5;
01017         static const int defaultAlignVertical = wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL;
01018         static const int defaultAlignHorizontal = wxALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL;
01019 
01023         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxAdvHdrCell &o)
01024         {
01025                 // copy attributes
01026                 m_label = o.m_label;
01027                 m_size  = o.m_size;
01028                 m_alignVertical = o.m_alignVertical;
01029                 m_alignHorizontal = o.m_alignHorizontal;
01030                 m_spacing = o.m_spacing;
01031                 m_verticalText = o.m_verticalText;
01032                 m_sortable = o.m_sortable;
01033                 m_resizeAllowed = o.m_resizeAllowed;
01034 
01035                 m_minSize = o.m_minSize;
01036                 m_maxSize = o.m_maxSize;
01037 
01038                 if (o.m_renderer != NULL) {
01039                         m_renderer = o.m_renderer->Clone();
01040                 }
01041                 else {
01042                         m_renderer = NULL;
01043                 }
01044 
01045                 // copy internals
01046                 m_rc = o.m_rc;
01047                 m_decompIndex = o.m_decompIndex;
01048                 m_isRow = o.m_isRow;
01049                 m_parent = o.m_parent;
01050                 m_subIndex = o.m_subIndex;
01051 
01052                 m_table = o.m_table;
01053 
01054                 // copy subcells
01055                 m_subCells = o.m_subCells;
01056                 ReparentSubCells();
01057         }
01058 
01063         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxChar *label = wxT(""))
01064         {
01065                 m_label = label;
01066                 SetDefaults();
01067         }
01068 
01073         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxString &label)
01074         {
01075                 m_label = label;
01076                 SetDefaults();
01077         }
01078 
01079         virtual ~wxAdvHdrCell()
01080         {
01081                 wxDELETE(m_renderer);
01082         }
01083 
01089         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(wxAdvHdrCell subHdrCell)
01090         {
01091                 subHdrCell.m_parent = this;
01092                 subHdrCell.m_isRow = m_isRow;
01093                 subHdrCell.m_subIndex = m_subCells.Count();
01094                 m_subCells.Add(subHdrCell);
01095                 return *this;
01096         }
01097 
01103         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(const wxChar *label)
01104         {
01105                 return Sub(wxAdvHdrCell(label));
01106         }
01107 
01113         bool IsComposite()
01114         {
01115                 return m_subCells.Count() != 0;
01116         }
01117 
01124         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignVertical(int alignVertical)
01125         {
01126                 m_alignVertical = alignVertical;
01127                 return *this;
01128         }
01129 
01134         int AlignVertical()
01135         {
01136                 return m_alignVertical;
01137         }
01138 
01145         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignHorizontal(int alignHorizontal)
01146         {
01147                 m_alignHorizontal = alignHorizontal;
01148                 return *this;
01149         }
01150 
01155         int AlignHorizontal()
01156         {
01157                 return m_alignHorizontal;
01158         }
01159 
01165         wxAdvHdrCell &SetVerticalText(bool verticalText)
01166         {
01167                 m_verticalText = verticalText;
01168                 return *this;
01169         }
01170 
01175         wxAdvHdrCell &VerticalText()
01176         {
01177                 return SetVerticalText(true);
01178         }
01179 
01184         bool IsVerticalText()
01185         {
01186                 return m_verticalText;
01187         }
01188 
01195         wxAdvHdrCell &SetSortable(bool sortable)
01196         {
01197                 m_sortable = sortable;
01198                 return *this;
01199         }
01200 
01205         wxAdvHdrCell &Sortable()
01206         {
01207                 return SetSortable(true);
01208         }
01209 
01214         bool IsSortable()
01215         {
01216                 return m_sortable;
01217         }
01218 
01223         wxAdvHdrCell &ResizeAllowed()
01224         {
01225                 m_resizeAllowed = true;
01226                 return *this;
01227         }
01228 
01234         wxAdvHdrCell &Renderer(wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *renderer)
01235         {
01236                 wxREPLACE(m_renderer, renderer);
01237                 return *this;
01238         }
01239 
01244         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *Renderer()
01245         {
01246                 return m_renderer;
01247         }
01248 
01254         wxAdvHdrCell &Spacing(wxCoord spacing)
01255         {
01256                 m_spacing = spacing;
01257                 return *this;
01258         }
01259 
01264         wxCoord Spacing()
01265         {
01266                 return m_spacing;
01267         }
01268 
01274         wxAdvHdrCell &Label(const wxString &label)
01275         {
01276                 m_label = label;
01277                 return *this;
01278         }
01279 
01284         const wxString &Label()
01285         {
01286                 return m_label;
01287         }
01288 
01295         wxAdvHdrCell &Size(wxCoord size)
01296         {
01297                 m_size = size;
01298                 return *this;
01299         }
01300 
01305         wxCoord Size()
01306         {
01307                 return m_size;
01308         }
01309 
01315         wxAdvHdrCell &MinSize(wxCoord minSize)
01316         {
01317                 m_minSize = minSize;
01318                 return *this;
01319         }
01320 
01325         wxCoord MinSize()
01326         {
01327                 return m_minSize;
01328         }
01329 
01335         wxAdvHdrCell &MaxSize(wxCoord maxSize)
01336         {
01337                 m_maxSize = maxSize;
01338                 return *this;
01339         }
01340 
01345         wxCoord MaxSize()
01346         {
01347                 return m_maxSize;
01348         }
01349 
01354         bool IsSubcell()
01355         {
01356                 return m_parent != NULL;
01357         }
01358 
01363         size_t GetSubCellCount()
01364         {
01365                 return m_subCells.Count();
01366         }
01367 
01373         wxAdvHdrCell *GetSubCell(size_t index)
01374         {
01375                 return &m_subCells[index];
01376         }
01377 
01382         wxSize CalcExtent(wxDC &dc)
01383         {
01384                 wxSize extent = dc.GetMultiLineTextExtent(m_label);
01385 
01386                 extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing);
01387                 //extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing + sortArrowSize);
01388 
01389                 if (m_verticalText) {
01390                         // rotate by 90 degrees
01391                         wxCoord tmp = extent.x;
01392                         extent.x = extent.y;
01393                         extent.y = tmp;
01394                 }
01395 
01396                 if (m_size != 0) {
01397                         if (m_isRow) {
01398                                 extent.SetHeight(m_size);
01399                         }
01400                         else {
01401                                 extent.SetWidth(m_size);
01402                         }
01403                 }
01404                 return extent;
01405         }
01406 
01412         size_t Layers()
01413         {
01414                 size_t layers = 1;
01415                 size_t maxSubLayers = IsComposite() ? 1 : 0;
01416 
01417                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(nsub, m_subCells) {
01418                         if (m_subCells[nsub].IsComposite()) {
01419                                 size_t subLayers = m_subCells[nsub].Layers();
01420                                 if (subLayers > maxSubLayers)
01421                                         maxSubLayers = subLayers;
01422                         }
01423                 }
01424                 return layers + maxSubLayers;
01425         }
01426 
01432         size_t GetDecompCellCount()
01433         {
01434                 size_t count = 0;
01435 
01436                 if (!IsComposite()) {
01437                         return 1;
01438                 }
01439 
01440                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01441                         count += m_subCells[n].GetDecompCellCount();
01442                 }
01443                 return count;
01444         }
01445 
01450         bool IsRow()
01451         {
01452                 return m_isRow;
01453         }
01454 
01460         size_t Index()
01461         {
01462                 return m_decompIndex;
01463         }
01464 
01465         bool IsRightEdge()
01466         {
01467                 return (RightSibling() == NULL); // if we have right sibling - cell is right edge
01468         }
01469 
01470         wxAdvHdrCell *RightSibling();
01471 
01478         static size_t GetDecompCellCount(wxAdvHdrCell *cells, size_t numCells);
01479 
01480 private:
01481         //
01482         // Internal functions.
01483         //
01484         void MarkAsRow()
01485         {
01486                 SetIsRowRecursive(true);
01487         }
01488 
01489         void MarkAsCol()
01490         {
01491                 SetIsRowRecursive(false);
01492         }
01493 
01494         void SetIsRowRecursive(bool isRow)
01495         {
01496                 m_isRow = isRow;
01497 
01498                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01499                         m_subCells[n].SetIsRowRecursive(isRow);
01500                 }
01501         }
01502 
01503         void SetDefaults()
01504         {
01505                 m_size = 0;
01506                 m_alignVertical = defaultAlignVertical;
01507                 m_alignHorizontal = defaultAlignHorizontal;
01508                 m_spacing = defaultSpacing;
01509                 m_verticalText = false;
01510                 m_sortable = false;
01511                 m_resizeAllowed = false;
01512 
01513                 m_renderer = NULL;
01514 
01515                 m_minSize = 0;
01516                 m_maxSize = (wxCoord) UNDEF_SIZE;
01517 
01518                 m_decompIndex = UNDEF_SIZE;
01519 
01520                 m_parent = NULL;
01521                 m_subIndex = UNDEF_SIZE;
01522 
01523                 m_table = NULL;
01524         }
01525 
01526         void ReparentSubCells()
01527         {
01528                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01529                         m_subCells[n].m_parent = this;
01530 
01531                         m_subCells[n].ReparentSubCells();
01532                 }
01533         }
01534 
01539         void RemoveSubCell(size_t index)
01540         {
01541                 m_subCells.RemoveAt(index);
01542         }
01543 
01544 
01545         //
01546         // Variables.
01547         //
01548         wxAdvHdrCellArray m_subCells;
01549 
01550         wxString m_label;
01551         wxCoord m_size;
01552         wxCoord m_minSize;
01553         wxCoord m_maxSize;
01554 
01555         int m_alignVertical;
01556         int m_alignHorizontal;
01557 
01558         wxCoord m_spacing;
01559 
01560         bool m_verticalText;
01561 
01562         bool m_sortable;
01563         bool m_resizeAllowed;
01564 
01565         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *m_renderer;
01566 
01567         wxAdvHdrCell *m_parent;
01568         size_t m_subIndex;
01569 
01570         //
01571         // used internally by wxAdvTable
01572         //
01573         // for wxAdvTable to store row/column position
01574         wxRect m_rc;
01575         size_t m_decompIndex;
01576         bool m_isRow;
01577 
01578         wxAdvTable *m_table;
01579 };

01600 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvTable : public wxScrolledWindow, public wxAdvTableDataModelObserver

01617         };

01981         size_t MaxRow()
01982         {
01983                 size_t maxRow = GetDecompRowCount();
01984                 if (maxRow == 0) {
01985                         return 0;
01986                 }
01987                 return maxRow - 1;
01988         }
01989 
01994         size_t MaxCol()
01995         {
01996                 size_t maxCol = GetDecompColCount();
01997                 if (maxCol == 0) {
01998                         return 0;
01999                 }
02000                 return maxCol - 1;
02001         }

02509         size_t IncrRow(size_t row, int incr)
02510         {
02511                 return (size_t) wxClip((int) row + incr, 0, (int) MaxRow());
02512         }

02514         size_t IncrCol(size_t col, int incr)
02515         {
